TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit AxHost/ConnectionPointCookie extends System.Object

summary.span: Conecta um controle ActiveX a um cliente que trata os eventos do controle.

span.span: Connects an ActiveX control to a client that handles the control’s events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Controles ActiveX se comunicar com clientes por meio de sua interface COM.ActiveX controls communicate with clients through their COM interface. O classe fornece o link entre o classe e o controle ActiveX.The class provides the link between the class and the ActiveX control. Para obter mais informações, consulte "Eventos no e objetos conectáveis COM" na biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.For more information, see "Events in COM and Connectable Objects" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

MemberSignature.Value: public ConnectionPointCookie (object source, object sink, Type eventInterface);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object source, object sink, class System.Type eventInterface) cil managed
Public Sub New (source As Object, sink As Object, eventInterface As Type)
public: ConnectionPointCookie(System::Object ^ source, System::Object ^ sink, Type ^ eventInterface);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: source
param.span: Um objeto conectável que contém pontos de conexão.

span.span: A connectable object that contains connection points.

param.name: sink
param.span: O coletor do cliente que recebe chamadas de saída do ponto de conexão.

span.span: The client's sink which receives outgoing calls from the connection point.

param.name: eventInterface
param.span: A interface de saída cujo objeto de ponto de conexão está sendo solicitado.

span.span: The outgoing interface whose connection point object is being requested.

summary.span: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O construtor estabelece uma conexão entre o cliente e o controle ActiveX.The constructor establishes a connection between the ActiveX control and the client.

exception.span: O ponto de conexão já atingiu seu limite de conexões e não pode aceitar mais nenhuma.

span.span: The connection point has already reached its limit of connections and cannot accept any more.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Disconnect() cil managed

summary.span: Desconecta o controle ActiveX do cliente.

span.span: Disconnects the ActiveX control from the client.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pela classe .

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método substitui .This method overrides . O código do aplicativo não deve chamar este método; o método `Finalize` de um objeto é invocado automaticamente durante a coleta de lixo, a menos que a finalização pelo coletor de lixo tenha sido desabilitada por uma chamada para o método .Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. Para obter mais informações, consulte [métodos Finalize e destruidores](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), e [substituindo o método Finalize](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
